summary: The diff demonstrates a comprehensive rebranding from ROOT X GLOBAL to ZINMATT GLOBAL with most requirements implemented. The website transformation includes updated branding, new service offerings, enhanced visual elements, and structural changes. However, several requirements have partial implementation or missing elements.

missing_requirements.requirement: Existing motion animation effects are preserved in hero section
missing_requirements.reason: While the hero section has been updated with new headline and subheadline, the diff does not show evidence that previous motion animation effects were preserved - only new animations (slow-zoom, fade transitions) are visible

missing_requirements.requirement: Slide-style animation is maintained in About section
missing_requirements.reason: The About section shows glassmorphism cards and transitions, but there is no explicit evidence of the slide-style animation being maintained from the previous version

missing_requirements.requirement: Slide-style card animations are maintained in Services section
missing_requirements.reason: While service cards have hover effects and transition delays, explicit slide-style animations characteristic of the original design are not evident in the diff

missing_requirements.requirement: Portfolio section implements horizontal sliding gallery layout
missing_requirements.reason: The portfolio section uses a grid layout (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4) rather than a horizontal sliding gallery as specified

missing_requirements.requirement: Images are displayed as static assets without backend routing
missing_requirements.reason: While images are referenced from /assets/generated/ directory, the diff shows no evidence of the actual image files being added to frontend/public/assets/generated. Only the references exist in components

hallucinated_features.description: Added ProblemSection.tsx component showing business pain points
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-29 explicitly removes the Problem section, but the diff shows a new ProblemSection.tsx file was created with 4 business pain points. This contradicts the requirement to remove this section

hallucinated_features.description: Added rotating background images with interval timer in hero section
hallucinated_features.reason: The hero section implements a rotating image gallery with 8-second intervals and fade transitions. This specific feature was not requested in any requirement
